item.description: This is a special edition of Karaoke at the Rosebud, usually there Sunday, Tuesday and Wednesday Nights. We had a free night on the calendar so we are planning a fun night of Karaoke and dance @ the Rosebud. No cover charge, great fun, great food, plenty of entertainment, pool table darts, and Keno. Great beer on tap and a great staff. This is a great place to meet and hang out, plenty of regulars, not a meetup up exclusive but a great spot for meet up folks to mix and mingle and have some fun. Check us out and have a great night of fun, food, drink and song.
item.name: Friday Night Karaoke @ The Rosebud
